kg.net.bazi.gsb4j.db

Interface LocalDatabase


  • public interface LocalDatabase
    Local threats list database.
    Author:
    azilet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear(ThreatListDescriptor descriptor)
      Clears local database data for the descriptor.
      boolean contains(String hash, ThreatListDescriptor descriptor)
      Checks if the hash exists in the local database for the supplied descriptor.

      Loads hashes for the threat list descriptor.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        List<String> load(ThreatListDescriptor descriptor)
           throws IOException
        Loads hashes for the threat list descriptor.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - descriptor to load hashes for
        Returns:
        hashes for the descriptor
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O errors occur

      • persist

        void persist(ThreatListDescriptor descriptor,
             List<String> hashes)
      throws IOException
        Saves hashes for the threat list descriptor.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - descriptor for the threat list hashes
        hashes - hashes to save
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O errors occur

      • contains

        boolean contains(String hash,
                 ThreatListDescriptor descriptor)
          throws IOException
        Checks if the hash exists in the local database for the supplied descriptor.
        Parameters:
        hash - hash prefix to check
        descriptor - descriptor to look in
        Returns:
        true if hash exists in the local database; false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException - when IO errors occur

      • clear

        void clear(ThreatListDescriptor descriptor)
    throws IOException
        Clears local database data for the descriptor.
        Parameters:
        descriptor - descriptor to clear data for
        Throws:
        IOException - when I/O errors occur
